page.title: 19REVIEW OF THE BLOCK 1
page.content: BECAUSE THE BLOCK COVERS AN AREA WHICH INCLUDES BOTH{TOWN AND COUNTRYSIDE, {CONTRASTS ARE GREAT}WITHIN THE SPACE OF A FEW MILES. TEN KILOMETRE_SQUARES OF THE BLOCK ARE RURAL WITH THE VAST MAJORITY OF THE POPULATION LIVING WITHIN THE TWO URBAN SQUARES. THE RURAL AREA IS POPULATED WITH PEOPLE WHO ARE EITHER INVOLVED IN{FARMING}OR ARE ABLE TO{AFFORD PROPERTY}ON THE COTSWOLD EDGE. THE VILLAGE OF PRESTBURY AND THE BATTLEDOWN RESIDENTIAL AREA CONTAIN SOME {EXPENSIVE PROPERTIES}WHILST MUCH OF THE REMAINDER CONSISTS OF {COUNCIL_OWNED HOUSING.} G.C.H.Q. IS EASILY THE{LARGEST EMPLOYER}AND THERE ARE A NUMBER OF SMALL FACTORIES MAINLY ALONG BOUNCERS LANE. THERE IS A VERY DISTINCT CONTRAST BETWEEN THE{LIFE {STYLES}OF PEOPLE IN DIFFERENT PARTS OF THE AREA.
